thread.title: eCann Media Announces Lineup of Disruptive Companies at the First Ever Cannabis Investor Summit
thread.title_full: eCann Media Announces Lineup of Disruptive Companies at the First Ever Cannabis Investor Summit

author: admin
title: eCann Media Announces Lineup of Disruptive Companies at the First Ever Cannabis Investor Summit
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/16/2015 @ 11:16 AM   eCann Media 
SAN FRANCISCO, Sept. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- eCann Media unveils the lineup for its inaugural "Cannabis Investor Summit", a new platform for investors looking to get into the legal cannabis industry. The Summit will showcase the best investment opportunities and benefits of investing in the Cannabis industry, with an emphasis on the transparency of a cloud-based environment. 
"As with every other frontier, technology is completely disrupting the cannabis space. The first annual Cannabis Investor Summit will showcase the most disruptive technology companies in the legal Marijuana space today," said eCann Media CEO Eddie Miller. 
The event begins at 10:00 am on Thursday, September 17(th), 2015. There will be live presentations educating potential investors on the immense opportunities in the industry and enterprises who are seeking capital. 5 companies will announce the beginning of their funding rounds at CIS. The summit will conclude with a dinner and networking event from 7pm - 10pm. 
One of the companies presenting at the Cannabis Investor Summit includes GreenRush.com, launched this year on April 29(th); it has become California's largest on-demand medical Cannabis Delivery platform . GreenRush is quickly expanding to Michigan, Nevada, and Arizona. With over 150 retailers on their platform today, GreenRush stands to become the go to utility for all on-demand Cannabis purchases, predicting over 1,000 retailers on-boarded and 250,000+ items to choose from by the next San Francisco Cannabis Investor Summit. 
Officially launching at CIS: Cannabis Hemp Exchange (The "CHEX") will debut TheCHEX.com , an enterprise-level wholesale exchange to serve suppliers and buyers of Cannabis commodities. The company is also opening its seed-funding round to early-stage investors at the Cannabis Investor Summit ("CIS") in San Francisco on September 17th, 2015 with an investment presentation and product demo. 
The CHEX is a mobile-first, fully-integrated cross-platform solution, complete with intuitive social features and supply chain management tools, providing a modern UX to trade cannabis plant components and derivatives. Leveraging formal commodity exchange properties, real-time market intelligence on TheCHEX.com will inform supply and demand visibility along with market price discovery, correction, and most importantly, stability. 
Also launching and debuting their innovative enterprise is SX Life, a first of its kind Cannabis lifestyle brand. Pioneered by SX Liquors founder David Knight in conjunction with eCann Media, SX Life will launch a unique range of female focused products utilizing innovative hardware built for the sophisticated female. 
The business of legal marijuana is in the midst of a major transformation. California, on Friday announced a huge initiative to regulate the Cannabis Industry. This means massive opportunity for companies across the entire supply chain. Each company presenting at the summit will showcase how their technology will disrupt the Legal Cannabis Industry. 
Join eCann on The Green Rush and get an exclusive opportunity to capitalize on the future unicorns of this emerging industry. 
About eCann Media 
eCann Media is a platform that empowers people to seamlessly and legally transact the business of Cannabis. With a portfolio of over 1,800 of the very best Cannabis related domain assets, eCann, Media is leading the industry across every niche. eCann creates, brands, and brings to market revolutionary Cannabis-focused technology enterprises. Their businesses range from lifestyle/media to digital marketplaces, to ecommerce and industrial technology. eCann Media's goal is to build the largest, all encompassing, and most ubiquitous Cannabis platform in the world; to help all Cannabis businesses create a digital presence and thrive by implementing cutting edge marketing practices, analytics, and infrastructure. Learn more about the Cannabis Investor Summit at http://www.CannabisInvestorSummit.com or www.CiS.ec 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/ecann-media-announces-lineup-of-disruptive-companies-at-the-first-ever-cannabis-investor-summit-300144333.html 
SOURCE eCann Media
